price: 56. (Ibraahiim) wuxuu yidhi: Yaa ka quusta Naxariista Rabbigii aan ahayn kuwa lunsan.
arabic: قَالَ وَمَن يَقۡنَطُ مِن رَّحۡمَةِ رَبِّهِۦٓ إِلَّا ٱلضَّآلُّونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: qāla waman yaqnaṭu min raḥmati rabbihi illā al-ḍālūna
